docs.snippet: If the Russian government is behind the theft and release of embarrassing emails from the Democratic Party, as U.S. officials have suggested, it may reflect less a love of Donald Trump or enmity for Hillary Clinton than a desire to discredit the U...
docs.lead_paragraph: If the Russian government is behind the theft and release of embarrassing emails from the Democratic Party, as U.S. officials have suggested, it may reflect less a love of Donald Trump or enmity for Hillary Clinton than a desire to discredit the U.S. political system.

headline.main: Behind Democrats' Email Leak, U.S. Experts See a Russian Subplot
headline.print_headline: Behind Democrats' Email Leak, U.S. Experts See a Russian Subplot

docs.snippet: Supporters of Bernie Sanders disrupted the first day of the Democratic convention on Monday, repeatedly chanting and booing mentions of Hillary Clinton's name as the party's hopes for a show of unity dissolved into frequent chaos....
docs.lead_paragraph: Supporters of Bernie Sanders disrupted the first day of the Democratic convention on Monday, repeatedly chanting and booing mentions of Hillary Clinton's name as the party's hopes for a show of unity dissolved into frequent chaos.

headline.main: Sanders Backers Revolt on Raucous Opening Day at U.S. Democratic Convention
headline.print_headline: Sanders Backers Revolt on Raucous Opening Day at U.S. Democratic Convention

docs.snippet: Cyber security experts and U.S. officials said on Monday there was evidence that Russia engineered the release of sensitive Democratic Party emails in order to influence the U.S. presidential election....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cyber security experts and U.S. officials said on Monday there was evidence that Russia engineered the release of sensitive Democratic Party emails in order to influence the U.S. presidential election.

headline.main: Democratic Party Email Leak Points to Russia: Cyber Experts, U.S. Officials
headline.print_headline: Democratic Party Email Leak Points to Russia: Cyber Experts, U.S. Officials
